Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 303rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (B) on 4/7/2015.
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Cincinnati on 5/11/2015 (Going to CIN: P Samuel Valenzuela. Going to SLB: 1B Jason Hults)...
Earned first career win on 6/15/2017...
Injured on 5/23/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/6/2020 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2021, off Robert Gonzalez (SLB)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $811,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 4/6/2022 (Going to CIN: 1B Estanis Aguilar, P Pablo Martinez, P Steven Cuyler. Going to BRO: P Samuel Valenzuela, 3B Benjamin Rosato, P Donald Newton)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/5/2023 to a 5-year deal worth $8,900,000 per year...
Traded from Detroit to Cincinnati on 4/21/2025 (Going to DET: P Dwight Harwell, P Tony Gonzalez. Going to CIN: P Samuel Valenzuela, 2B James Gallucci, P Robert Rhames)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Boston on 2/10/2026 (Going to CIN: C Michael Wilson, C Bill Pence, 2B Quinton Applin, LF Edgar McVeigh, LF Glenn Chancey. Going to BOS: P Jose Raposa, P Thurman Brawley,
P Samuel Valenzuela, C Warren Wilson, CF Yonehiko Kafu)...
